<div class="storyHead">

<h1 itemprop="headline name">Moped gang target wealthy Hampstead residents to steal expensive jewellery</h1>
              <h2  itemprop="alternativeHeadline description">
Attacks take place in affluent north London suburb, with targets selected 
  because of their 'outward show of wealth', such as designer watches and 
  handbags 

          </h2>
              <style media="print">
        .newGigyaShare { display: none !important; }
    </style>

    <div id="newGigyaShareTop-Holder">
        <div id="newGigyaShareTop" class="newGigyaShare"></div>

    </div>

              <div class="ssImg">
              <img src="http://i.telegraph.co.uk/multimedia/archive/03203/moped-gang_3203892b.jpg" width="620" height="387" alt="Corrie Moroney, Alan Fitzgerald and Ellis Parkinson were convicted of conspiracy to rob" itemprop="image"/>
              <div class="artImageExtras" >
              
          <div class="ingCaptionCredit">
              <span class="caption">Corrie Moroney, Alan Fitzgerald and Ellis Parkinson were convicted of conspiracy to rob</span> <span class="credit">Photo: National Pictures</span></div>
              </div>

<div class="oneHalf gutter">
              <div class="story">
              <div class="cl"> </div>
              <div class="byline">
              <div >

          <p class="bylineBody">
              By <span rel="author" >Agency</span></p>

          </div>
              <p class="publishedDate">3:04PM GMT 18 Feb 2015</p>
              <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-02-18"/><div class="cl"> </div>
              </div>
              <div id="mainBodyArea" itemprop="articleBody">

          
          
          <div class="firstPar"><p> Three members of a moped mugging gang who terrorised wealthy homeowners in a series of violent robberies have been jailed for a total of 23 years. </p></div><div class="secondPar"><p> The attacks all took place within three miles of the affluent north London suburb of Hampstead with targets selected because of their "outward show of wealth" such as designer watches and handbags and expensive jewellery. </p></div><div class="thirdPar"><p> Among those robbed was celebrity cook and businesswoman Annabel Karmel, who had her handbag and £16,000 Rolex watch grabbed as she got out of her car in St John’s Wood. </p></div><div class="fourthPar"><p> Another victim was publishing executive Stan Myerson, the joint managing director of Northern & Shell, which owns Express Newspapers. He was attacked on his driveway in Hampstead and robbed of his watch and cash. </p></div><div class="fifthPar"><p> Most of the victims were attacked on their own driveways by up to four hammer-wielding thugs dressed in black and wearing helmets, balaclavas and scarves, who rode mopeds with stolen registration plates. </p></div><div id="tmg-related-links" class="related-links-float-design related_links_inline">
              <div class="headerOne styleOne"><h2><span>Related Articles</span></h2></div>
              
          <ul>
              
          <li class="firstItem">
                                                                    <!-- imagePosition: centre, columnContext: oneSixth -->
<div class="piccentre containerdiv  ">
        <a class=" imageParsely" href="/news/10841352/Moped-gang-steal-60000-watch-as-victim-sweeps-his-drive.html"><img src="http://i.telegraph.co.uk/multimedia/archive/02915/moped5_2915776g.jpg" alt="The victim, whose ordeal was captured on CCTV, said he was so traumatised by the robbery that he is leaving the UK this week in case the gang return" border="0" width="140"  height="87" />
              <span class="cornerimagecentre"> </span></a>
                </div></li>
                                                            <li class="bullet">
                                                        <p>
                    <a  href="/news/10841352/Moped-gang-steal-60000-watch-as-victim-sweeps-his-drive.html">Moped gang steal £60,000 watch as victim sweeps his drive</a>
                </p>

          <span class="relContDate">19 May 2014</span>
              </li>
              <li class="video">
              <p>
                    <a  href="/news/uknews/crime/11365244/Have-a-go-hero-tackles-jewellery-store-robber-armed-with-a-machete.html">Have-a-go-hero tackles jewellery store robber armed with a machete</a>
                </p>

          <span class="relContDate">23 Jan 2015</span>
              </li> 
              <li class="bullet">
                                                        <p>
                    <a  href="/news/uknews/crime/10958837/Dorchester-Hotel-suffers-second-smash-and-grab-raid-in-a-month.html">Dorchester Hotel suffers second smash and grab raid in a month</a>
                </p>

          <span class="relContDate">10 Jul 2014</span>
              </li>
              <li class="bullet">
                                                        <p>
                    <a  href="/news/uknews/crime/6811426/Smash-and-grab-moped-gang-jailed.html">'Smash and grab' moped gang jailed</a>
                </p>

          <span class="relContDate">14 Dec 2009</span>
              </li>
              </ul>
              </div>
              <div class="body"><p> In other attacks car windows were smashed to intimidate the victims while other weapons used in the robberies included a Taser and a knife with a six inch blade. </p><p> Statements from the traumatised victims were read out at Blackfriars Crown Court in which they described suffering flashbacks, sleepless nights and their terrified children too scared to go out and play. </p><p> The nine-year-old daughter of one victim, who saw her mum being mugged by the gang, even wrote a disturbing poem about the incident, called Down From My Eyes Run 100 Tears. </p><p> Rolex and Cartier watches were among the designer goods stolen, as well as rings worth thousands of pounds, plus cash and mobile phones. </p><p> A 57-year-old businessman, who was jumped by the gang in the gated driveway of his £2 million home in Platt's Lane, Hampstead, fought back, armed only with a broom. </p><p> His £24,000 watch and a gold chain were nonetheless snatched. </p><p> The gang also smashed the windows of a car near a park as two parents put their children, aged four and seven, inside. </p><p> The children's mother said the £24,000 watch she was forced to hand over had been a gift from a sister-in-law who later died from breast cancer. </p><p> The robbery spree was finally brought to an end by officers from the Flying Squad who studied CCTV footage and pulled together witness reports to identify the three suspects and mount a surveillance operation. </p><p> Undercover police followed them after they ambushed a woman in St John's Wood, stealing her watch and handbag, on June 20th. </p><p> <img refid="2915779" version="c" width="460" height="287" caption="Similar “moped gang” raids have forced residents in Hampstead Garden Suburb to fit metal bars on to windows and reinforce front doors" declared-caption="" src="http://i.telegraph.co.uk/multimedia/archive/02915/moped4_2915779c.jpg" photographer="" name="moped4" alttext="Similar “moped gang” raids have forced residents in Hampstead Garden Suburb to fit metal bars on to windows and reinforce front doors" copyright="Evening Standard/London Live"></p><p> <sup>A string of moped gang raids forced residents in Hampstead to fit metal bars to windows (Evening Standard/London Live)</sup> </p><p> <img refid="2915743" version="c" width="460" height="287" caption="The man in his 50s was sweeping the street outside his home near Hampstead Heath when four men on two mopeds pulled up outside" declared-caption="" src="http://i.telegraph.co.uk/multimedia/archive/02915/moped1_2915743c.jpg" photographer="" name="moped1" alttext="The man in his 50s was sweeping the street outside his home near Hampstead Heath when four men on two mopeds pulled up outside" copyright="LONDON LIVE"></p><p> <sup>A man in his 50s was sweeping the street outside his home near Hampstead Heath when four men on two mopeds pulled up outside (Evening Standard/London Live)</sup> </p><p> <img refid="2915755" version="c" width="460" height="287" caption="He had attempted to defend himself with his broom as two men clad in black and wearing crash helmets ran into his driveway" declared-caption="" src="http://i.telegraph.co.uk/multimedia/archive/02915/moped3_2915755c.jpg" photographer="" name="moped3" alttext="He had attempted to defend himself with his broom as two men clad in black and wearing crash helmets ran into his driveway" copyright="Evening Standard/London Live"></p><p> <sup>He had attempted to defend himself with his broom as two men clad in black and wearing crash helmets ran into his driveway (Evening Standard/London Live)</sup> </p><p> Corrie Moroney, 23, of Tufnell Park, north London, Alan Fitzgerald, 20, and Ellis Parkinson, 21, both of Holloway, north London, were convicted of conspiracy to robbery in relation to 12 incidents in May, June and July last summer. </p><p> Moroney, who was involved in all 12 incidents, was sentenced to 10 years behind bars, plus an extra 12 months for a separate assault when he fractured a man's cheekbone in a betting shop. </p><p> Parkinson was jailed for eight years for his part in seven incidents and Fitzgerald got four years in a Young Offender's Institution. </p><p> The court heard that since the vicious muggins, some victims are afraid to go out alone while others have installed security gates and employ ex-soldiers to patrol their streets. </p><p> <sup><img refid="3203893" version="c" width="460" height="287" caption="Corrie Moroney on the right " declared-caption="" src="http://i.telegraph.co.uk/multimedia/archive/03203/moped-2_3203893c.jpg" photographer="" name="moped-2" alttext="Corrie Moroney on the right " copyright="National Pictures"> </sup><br><sup>Corrie Moroney on the right (National Pictures) </sup></p><p> Judge David Richardson said the trio had been responsible for a "campaign of robbery" which had "life changing" consequences for its victims. </p><p> "They will never forget what happened to them," he said. </p><p> Detective Sergeant Gail Lilley, of the Serious and Organised Crime Command, said: "I am very pleased with the sentencing and that three dangerous violent offenders have been caught who were terrorising residents. </p><p> "The sentencing sends a clear message to those involved in street robberies that they face a lengthy custodial sentence." </p></div>

});
});
} else {

}
})();
</script>

    <script>

    if(!( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) )) {

        /*
         Read Next Widget Data
         */
        var readNextArticleList = []
;
        var readNextCurrentArticleId = "11420454";

        /*
         Read Next Widget
         */
        var readNextWidget = (function(){

            var settings = {
                articleImage: "",
                articleTitle: "",
                articleUrl: "#",
                articleId: "",
                currentArticleId: "",
                articleList: [],
                articleListToSkip: [],
                readNextCookieName: "tmg_read_next",
                openButton: "#readNextOpen a",
                closeButton: "#closeBtn a",
                articleContainer: "#readNextArticleContainer",
                widgetContainer: "#readNextWidget",
                displayThumbnail: false,
                panelOpen: false,
                autoOpen: true
            };

            var renderTemplate = function() {
                var template = '<div id="readNextWidget" style="display:none">' +
                        '<div id="readNextOpen"><div class="topBar"></div><div id="readNextOpenInner"><a href="' + settings.articleUrl + '"><span>Next Story</span><span class="icn"></span></a></div></div>' +
                        '<div id="readNextArticleContainer" style="display:none">' +
                        '<div id="nextArticle"><div class="topBar"></div>' +
                        '<div id="nextArticleWrapper">'+
                        '<div id="nextArticleInnerWrapper">'+
                        '<p id="readNextLabel">MOST VIEWED IN NEWS</p>';
                        
if(settings.articleImage && settings.articleImage!="null" && settings.displayThumbnail){
template = template + '<a id="nextPageThumbnail" href="' + settings.articleUrl + '"><img src="'+ settings.articleImage +'"/></a>';
}
                        
template = template + '<a id="nextPageTitle" href="' + settings.articleUrl + '"><span>' + settings.articleTitle + '</span></a></div></div>' +
                        '</div>' +
                        '<div id="closeBtn"><div class="topBar"></div><a href="#"><span></span></a></div>' +
                        '</div>' +
                        '<iframe style="border:none;position:absolute;top:0;left:0; height:100%;width:100%;z-index:-1;" id="iefix" src="about:blank"></iframe>' + //fix for IE bug
                        '</div>';
                return template;
            };


            var init = function(currentArticleId, articleList, displayThumbnail) {

                settings.articleList = articleList;
                settings.currentArticleId = currentArticleId;
                settings.displayThumbnail = displayThumbnail;

                settings.articleListToSkip = unescape($.cookie(settings.readNextCookieName)).split(',');

                if ($.cookie(settings.readNextCookieName) != null) {
                    chooseNextArticle(settings.currentArticleId, settings.articleList, settings.articleListToSkip);
                    updateCookieBasedOnArticleList(settings.currentArticleId, settings.articleList, settings.articleListToSkip);
                } else {
                    chooseNextArticle(settings.currentArticleId, settings.articleList, settings.articleListToSkip);
                    createCookieBasedOnArticleList(settings.currentArticleId, settings.articleList, settings.articleListToSkip);
                }


                if (settings.articleId != "") {

                    $(renderTemplate()).appendTo("body");

                    $("#nextArticleWrapper a, #readNextOpenInner a").click(function () {
                        _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'wayfarer_read_next', 'click_headline', 'version_1']);

                        getNavPos($(this).attr("href"), "wayfarerReadNext");
                    });

                    bindUIActions();

                    var displayed = false;

                    setTimeout(function () {
                        if (!displayed) {
                            displayed == true;
                            readNextWidget.display();
                        }

                    }, 10000);

                    $(window).scroll(function () {
                        if (isScrolledIntoView("#tmg-related-links")) {
                            if (!displayed) {
                                displayed == true;
                                readNextWidget.display();
                            }
                        }

                        if(isScrolledIntoView("#shareBottom") || isScrolledIntoView("#newGigyaShareBottom")) {
                            if(settings.autoOpen) {
                                openArticleContainer();
                            }
                        }

                        if($(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height() == $(document).height()) {
                            if(settings.autoOpen) {
                                openArticleContainer();
                            }
                        }
                    });
                }
            };

            var display = function () {
                $(settings.widgetContainer).fadeIn(2000, function () {
                    //animation complete
                    _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'wayfarer_read_next', 'display_closed', 'version_1']);
                });
            };

            var bindUIActions = function () {
                $(settings.openButton).mouseenter(function (event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'wayfarer_read_next', 'hover_closed', 'version_1']);
                    openArticleContainer();
                });
                $(settings.widgetContainer).mouseleave(function (event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    closeArticleContainer();
                });
                $(settings.closeButton).click(function (event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'wayfarer_read_next', 'click_close', 'version_1']);
                    updateCookie(settings.articleId, settings.articleListToSkip);
                    closeArticleContainer();
                    settings.autoOpen = false;
                });
            };

            var openArticleContainer = function () {
                if (!settings.panelOpen) {
$("#readNextArticleContainer").show();//show/hide because height is calculated incorrectly for elements with display:none
                    $("#readNextArticleContainer").hide();
                    $(settings.articleContainer).toggle('slide', {direction: 'left'}, function () {
                        //animation complete
                        _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'wayfarer_read_next', 'display_open', 'version_1']);
                    });
                    settings.panelOpen = !settings.panelOpen;
                    settings.autoOpen = false; //set auto open to false once user has viewed this once
                }
                return false;
            };

            var closeArticleContainer = function () {
                if (settings.panelOpen) {
                    $(settings.articleContainer).toggle('slide', {direction: 'left'}, function () {
                        //animation complete
                    });
                    settings.panelOpen = !settings.panelOpen;
                }
                return false;
            };


            var isScrolledIntoView = function(elem) {
                if($(elem).length) { //check if element exists
                    var docViewTop = $(window).scrollTop();
                    var docViewBottom = docViewTop + $(window).height();

                    var elemTop = $(elem).offset().top;
                    var elemBottom = elemTop + $(elem).height();

                    return ((elemBottom <= docViewBottom) && (elemTop >= docViewTop));
                } else {
                    return false;
                }
            };

            var unique = function(array) {
                return array.filter(function (el, index, arr) {
                    return index == arr.indexOf(el);
                });
            }

            var createCookieBasedOnArticleList = function(currentArticleId, articleList, articleListToSkip) {
                articleList.some(function (article) {
                    if (article.id == currentArticleId) {
                        articleListToSkip[0] = currentArticleId;
                        $.cookie(settings.readNextCookieName, escape(articleListToSkip.join(',')), {path: '/', expires: 1, domain: 'telegraph.co.uk'});
                        return true;
                    }
                });
            }

            var updateCookieBasedOnArticleList = function(currentArticleId, articleList, articleListToSkip) {
                articleList.some(function (article) {
                    if (article.id == currentArticleId) {
                        updateCookie(currentArticleId, articleListToSkip);
                        return true;
                    }
                });
            }

            var updateCookie = function(articleIdToSkip, articleListToSkip) {
                articleListToSkip.push(articleIdToSkip);
                articleListToSkip = unique(articleListToSkip);
                $.cookie(settings.readNextCookieName, escape(articleListToSkip.join(',')), {path: '/', expires: 1, domain: 'telegraph.co.uk'});
            }

            var chooseNextArticle = function (currentArticleId, articleList, articleListToSkip) {
                articleList.some(function (article) {
                    if ((article.id != currentArticleId) && ($.inArray(article.id, articleListToSkip) === -1)) {

                        //set article
                        settings.articleTitle = article.title;
                        settings.articleUrl = article.url;
                        settings.articleId = article.id;
settings.articleImage = article.imgUrl;
                        return true;
                    }
                });
            }

            //public API
            return {
                settings: settings,
                init: init,
                display: display,
                openArticleContainer: openArticleContainer,
                closeArticleContainer: closeArticleContainer
            }
        })();

    };
</script>
